title: “You Are Not So Smart” with Freddie DeBoer

media:group.media:title: “You Are Not So Smart” with Freddie DeBoer
media:group.media:description:
In this mini clip Freddie DeBoer talks about his book ’The Cult of Smart’ and explains how unwilling we are as a society to admit that people cannot reach the same echelons of intelligence through good education and sheer grit and much more.
The full episode “Marxism, Intelligence, And The Thing” with Freddie DeBoer is now available to all via - https://youtu.be/a9c56xZ-WQU

Enjoy!

ConversationswithColeman #CWC #Karlmarx#ColemanHughes #FreddieDeBoer #Marxism #Intelligence
